meanings.sent2: Many pharaohs ruled Egypt long ago.
meanings.sent3: The pharaohs decided to have a race on their chariots.
meanings.sent4: The pharaohs' power was as vast as the desert sands.
meanings.sent5: Legends of the pharaohs continue to captivate historians.

meanings.definition: The plural form of pharaoh, referring to multiple rulers in ancient Egypt.
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists study the tombs of the pharaohs.
meanings.sent2: The pharaohs' reigns were marked by opulence and intrigue.
meanings.sent3: The pharaohs gathered for a feast in the royal palace.
meanings.sent4: The pharaohs' legacy echoes through the corridors of time.
meanings.sent5: The pharaohs' statues stand tall in the museum exhibit.
